{{Actor| | type = Armor | name = Amulet of warding | class = AmuletOfWarding | game = Hexen | doomednum = 8008 | spawnid = 71 | spawnname = T_AMULETOFWARDING }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Armor|Armor]]→[[Classes:HexenArmor|HexenArmor]]→AmuletOfWarding
The Amulet of Warding is a silver pendant on a leather chain with a blue gemstone. It increases a Hexen player class's Armor Class by a certain amount: * +5 for Daedolon the Mage * +4 for Parias the Cleric * +1 for Baratus the Fighter In Hexen, it is designed to be used with the [[Classes:FalconShield|Falcon Shield]], [[Classes:MeshArmor|Mesh Armor]] and [[Classes:PlatinumHelm|Platinum Helm]], but if imported in another game only one piece of [[Classes:HexenArmor|Hexen Armor]] can be used at a time. In Hexen.wad, the sprite is actually named ARM4A0 and is [[Sprite renaming|renamed at load-time]] by ZDoom. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR AmuletOfWarding : {{Class|HexenArmor}} { +{{Flag|NOGRAVITY}} {{Property|Health}} 3 // Armor class {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 0 {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_ARMOR4" // "AMULET OF WARDING" States { Spawn: AR_4 A -1 Stop } } ==Related Classes== [[Classes:ArtiBoostArmor|ArtiBoostArmor]], called in-game the Dragonskin Bracers, enhance a character's Hexen Armor class.
